title: Financial Analyst II at Kaztronix (Bridgewater, NJ)
text: Source: Kaztronix Location: Bridgewater, NJ Duties: Assist the Finance Team to close the books and present monthly results to business partners on a timely basis. Assist with providing monthly commentary to explain variances between actual results and / or budget / forecasts. This includes: Consolidate monthly actuals data in central tool (TM1) - From local SAP data Provide support for the monthly Performance reports and analysis - US OPEX reporting to Sales Force and Field Medical teams Sales Force and Field Medical Teams support - Develop expense budgets/forecasts Identify risks and opportunities that affect the achievement of these forecasts and allocating sales force spend to product brands Experience: 3 to 9 years. Skills: Preferred Qualifications: MBA or CPA Pharmaceutical industry experience Experience with TM1 and SAP Strong Excel skills Strong analytical capabilities Education: Bachelor's degree from an accredited four-year college or university with an area of specialization in Accounting or Finance 3-5 years of diversified financial/controlling experience
